name: Block Miner
description:
Idle clicker game where you mine blocks for money! Satisfying animations and unique graphics. 

Early access with lots more planned to come.

IF YOU HAVE ANY ISSUES-

-Most problems you will encounter will be on the WEB VERSION, as this game's target build is WINDOWS not WEBGL. If you have any problems in the web version they will eventually be fixed but your problem most likely doesn't exist on the WIN version.
